resources.string: * We have an Internal Server Error , Please Try Again Later .
*The Connection is Timeout , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry ,No Internet Found , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , but there is an Error happened , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , but you may be cancelled the request from your side , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry ,Error occured while reading from the Secure socket, Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry ,Cannot write output after reading input, Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , but there is a bad request happened , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , but you are not Authorized , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , but this service is not available , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , but you are fobidden to make this action , Please Try Again Later .
* Sorry , server understands the content type of the request entity, and the syntax of the request entity is correct, but it was unable to process the contained instructions.
* Sorry , But this Page is not Found , Please Try Again Later .
